term.title: diffusion coefficient

item.text: Proportionality constant D, relating the flux of amount of entities B to their concentration gradientJn = -D.∇.cB.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 969 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)
